import axios from "axios" import { SubmitHandler, useForm } from "react-hook-form" export const LoginForm=()=>{ interface InputForm{ userName:string password:string } const {register,handleSubmit}=useForm() const onSubmit: SubmitHandler=(data:any)=>{ axios.post("http://localhost:8080/login",{userName:data.userName,password:data.password}) } return(
Felhasználónév
Jelszó
) }
